players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, claim your info now. If you’re a real detective, give us your check and reasoning. Otherwise we’re just guessing."

Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Diana’s death confirms there was a kill; my check is the only concrete info. Alice, please vote Bob. Bob pushing me to out early fits scum desperation."

You: "Charlie, if you’re detective, why check Bob N1 instead of a quieter slot? Bob, counter-claim or explain why Charlie would fake this as scum. Also, Charlie, detail your N1 thought process and timing."

You: "Bob, are you counter-claiming detective or not? If no, I’m leaning to vote you. Charlie, specify exact N1: time/order you chose Bob, and what you expected from Diana. Also, Bob: why would Charlie pick you N1?"

Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. No counter-claim = 1 DT world. N1 I locked Bob before night end because he’s the most influential/likeliest kill-decider; a red on him breaks the game. Diana’s death confirms NK. Alice, vote Bob."

Bob: "Charlie is lying to rush this. If he truly locked me N1, he’d pre-commit in thread Day 0 or give a timestamped plan. Alice, force him to post exact lock timing and why Diana over you for NK. Don’t quick-vote."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
